"A.P.239/5/10/12:00": "Haaa... We finally did it. We should be okay now, right?"
"Yucreta?"
"...! Get back!"
"Eh!? This is bad! What the heck is that?!"
"It couldn't hold itself back from the bait? Left it in pieces before swallowing it up... What a terrible, greedy thing."
"You're the only one left."
"Shut up, Yucretia!"
"<%me>, are you okay?"
"Darker reactions in Lillipa are increasing... I knew it, Aurora's appearance was a sign to something."
"Apprentice is planning to resurrect itself as a form of this planet."
"Umm... Indeed, this scale is a bit too much for us to handle, Yuc-chan."
"ARKS representative! I'm communicating, are you listening?"
"Of course, I can hear you. Nice to meet you, Yucreta."
"Dark Falz [Apprentice] is resurrecting itself."
"In order to stop this, we need cooperation from a large number of ARKS! Can you lend us power?"
"You didn't even need to mention it. I'll pass the emergency to all ARKS. Is that okay?"
"...Can you really trust my words?"
"It's because we've come to be able to trust you. Right, <%me>?"
"Alright, the four of you, since it's dangerous there, come back to the ship."
"You mean... go back to the ARKS ship?"
"What Yucchan, are you scared? Are you afraid that people will be angry at you or hate you?"
"Let's go home, Yucreta."
"...It's not like I have a choice, do I?"
"You have received Yucreta's Partner Card"
"Don't turn eyes away"
"外伝 此処に在る意味"
